title: What are ACT Broadband Chennai plans? - Quora

response.answer_text: Please check here Broadband Plans in Chennai Plan Name Internet Speed Monthly Data(Download + Upload) Post FUP Speed Monthly Rental ACT Basic 50 Mbps 200 GB 512 Kbps ₹ 799 ACT Blaze 100 Mbps 500 GB 1 Mbps ₹ 999 ACT Blast Promo 150 Mbps 1000 GB 1 Mbps ₹ 1049 ACT Storm 200 Mbps 1250 GB 1 Mbps ₹ 1099 ACT Lightning 250 Mbps 1500 GB 1 Mbps ₹ 1299 ACT Incredible 350 Mbps 2000 GB 2 Mbps ₹ 1999 Act giga 1 Gbps 3000 GB 2 Mbps ₹ 2999
